code:
// CourseModel - Quản lý logic nghiệp vụ cho Course
// Sync với database schema OCMS1
export class CourseModel{// Lấy tất cả courses
static getAllCourses(){return this.courses;}// Lấy course theo code
static getCourseByCode(courseCode){return this.courses.find(course=>course.courseCode===courseCode);}// Lấy courses theo type
static getCoursesByType(courseType){return this.courses.filter(course=>course.courseType===courseType);}// Thêm course mới
static addCourse(course){this.courses.push(course);return course;}// Cập nhật course
static updateCourse(courseCode,updates){const index=this.courses.findIndex(course=>course.courseCode===courseCode);if(index!==-1){this.courses[index]={...this.courses[index],...updates};return this.courses[index];}return null;}// Xóa course
static deleteCourse(courseCode){const index=this.courses.findIndex(course=>course.courseCode===courseCode);if(index!==-1){this.courses.splice(index,1);return true;}return false;}// Lấy tất cả classes
static getAllClasses(){return this.classes;}// Lấy classes theo course
static getClassesByCourse(courseCode){return this.classes.filter(cls=>cls.courseCode===courseCode);}// Lấy classes theo semester
static getClassesBySemester(semesterCode,year){return this.classes.filter(cls=>cls.semesterCode===semesterCode&&cls.year===year);}// Thêm class mới
static addClass(cls){this.classes.push(cls);return cls;}// Kiểm tra xem class có còn chỗ không
static isClassAvailable(classId){const cls=this.classes.find(c=>c.classId===classId);if(!cls)return false;return cls.currentEnrollment<cls.capacity;}// Đăng ký học viên vào class
static enrollStudent(classId){const cls=this.classes.find(c=>c.classId===classId);if(!cls||!this.isClassAvailable(classId))return false;cls.currentEnrollment+=1;return true;}// Hủy đăng ký học viên
static unenrollStudent(classId){const cls=this.classes.find(c=>c.classId===classId);if(!cls||cls.currentEnrollment<=0)return false;cls.currentEnrollment-=1;return true;}// Lấy schedule cho class
static getScheduleForClass(classId){return this.schedules.find(schedule=>schedule.classId===classId);}// Lấy tất cả schedules
static getAllSchedules(){return this.schedules;}// Lấy semesters
static getAllSemesters(){return this.semesters;}// Lấy thông tin chi tiết course với classes
static getCourseDetails(courseCode){const course=this.getCourseByCode(courseCode);const classes=this.getClassesByCourse(courseCode);return{course,classes};}}CourseModel.courses=[{courseCode:'CS101',courseName:'Introduction to Computer Science',credit:3,courseType:'L'},{courseCode:'CS102',courseName:'Programming Fundamentals',credit:4,courseType:'P'},{courseCode:'MATH101',courseName:'Calculus I',credit:4,courseType:'L'},{courseCode:'ENG101',courseName:'English Composition',credit:3,courseType:'L'},{courseCode:'PHYS101',courseName:'Physics I',credit:4,courseType:'L'}];CourseModel.semesters=[{semesterCode:'Fall',year:2024},{semesterCode:'Spring',year:2024}];CourseModel.classes=[{classId:'CS101-F24-01',courseCode:'CS101',courseName:'Introduction to Computer Science',semesterCode:'Fall',year:2024,capacity:30,currentEnrollment:3},{classId:'CS102-F24-01',courseCode:'CS102',courseName:'Programming Fundamentals',semesterCode:'Fall',year:2024,capacity:25,currentEnrollment:2},{classId:'MATH101-F24-01',courseCode:'MATH101',courseName:'Calculus I',semesterCode:'Fall',year:2024,capacity:35,currentEnrollment:2}];CourseModel.schedules=[{scheduleId:'SCH001',classId:'CS101-F24-01',room:'Room 101',timeSlot:'Monday 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM'},{scheduleId:'SCH002',classId:'CS102-F24-01',room:'Lab 201',timeSlot:'Tuesday 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM'},{scheduleId:'SCH003',classId:'MATH101-F24-01',room:'Room 102',timeSlot:'Wednesday 10:00 AM - 11:30 AM'}];
